title: The Daughter-in-Law Rules: 101 Surefire Ways to Make Friends with Your Mother-In-Law!
description: "Next to Waterford Crystal, The Daughter-in-Law Rules may be the best wedding gift you can give!"Tim Bete, author of Guide to Pirate ParentingDo you dread visits with your mother-in-law? Do you find yourself dodging ruthless comments hurled your way at every possible moment? Is battling your mother-in-law a simple fact of life, or is there another way to mitigate the age old conflict between mother and wife? In her hilarious new book The Daughter-in-Law Rules author Sally Shields lays out simple and witty strategies to aid wives of all ages in the difficult art of mastering the mother-in-law. With her 101 rules to manage your mother-in-law she scrutinizes every element of MIL relations; from the decorum of housekeeping to the delicate world of child rearing. The Daughter-in-Law Rules provides a revolutionary set of strategies, making copasetic coexistence possible at last!
author: Sally Shields
